name: HNTB CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, S. 2302, Americas Transportation Infrastructure Act of 2019, and H.R. 7095, the Investing in a New Vision for the Environment and Surface Transportation (INVEST) in America Act.
Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2022 appropriations bills, The American Jobs Plan and HR 1319 - The American Rescue Plan Act of 2021.

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2022 appropriations bills, The American Jobs Plan and HR 1319 - The American Rescue Plan Act of 2021; bipartisan infrastructure package

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2022 and FY 2023 appropriations bills, The American Jobs Plan and HR 1319 - The American Rescue Plan Act of 2021; bipartisan infrastructure package

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2023 appropriations bills, The American Jobs Plan and HR 1319 - The American Rescue Plan Act of 2021; bipartisan infrastructure package and federal administration of funds

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2023 appropriations bills, The American Jobs Plan and HR 1319 - The American Rescue Plan Act of 2021, bipartisan infrastructure package and federal administration of funds, Inflation Reduction Act, and federal transportation grants

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2024 appropriations bills, bipartisan infrastructure package and federal administration of funds, Inflation Reduction Act, federal transportation grants; USACE grants; Water Resources Authorization Act; appropriations; FAA reauthorization

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on federal and state transportation authorizations, FY 2025 appropriations bills, bipartisan infrastructure package and federal administration of funds, Inflation Reduction Act, federal transportation grants; USACE grants; Water Resources Authorization Act; appropriations; FAA reauthorization
